full_sentence: Of course that the women and children enjoy violence, too! Yesterday, I had an encounter with a black woman on the road. I will spare you the details cause it was the same old story. As for the children, they also love the violence! I went to school with a high population of black children. Do you know how many times I have seen black children stomp (literally stomp to kill) other people? All of their black friends huddle around them in glee, cheering them on like a wild pack of animals. I'm just surprised you haven't witnessed this!
Ugly chinks, as we are usually called, are the best buddies you can find
decent people are allowed here, so queers keep out
my dealer got me some high quality shit it makes me fly away
